summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of East Galer Street from 15th Avenue North to 17th Avenue North in the City of Seattle, by grading and constructing concrete sidewalks under Ordinance No. 13305, creating Local Improvement District No. 1209 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
